Awk100.Purpose: A quick and dirty baseball simulator for investigating the efficiency of batting lineups
Awk100.Email:
r.p.loui@gmail.com This was written for the AI course, and for several investigations, including the determination of whether it is a good idea to bat the pitcher in the 8th spot. One hypothesis that emerges from this program that deserves further study is that the most potent offense is one that spreads rather than concentrates the batting threats.
